item.title: Firemaking [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“badboyzack10, post:3, topic:427251”]all the logs work want my msn and ill show you?

zackdavidson2011@hotmail.co.uk[/quote]

No. You can add my Skype and I’ll help you: SpecialAgentJackBower

Look at all the content involving the other logs and compare them to magic logs. You’re bound to find a difference, but I’m not going to spoonfeed you.

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking [pi]
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

Hello This is my glitch if i have like 20 fm i can still burn magic logs but dosent delete them

				if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1511 ) {//normal logs		
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);				
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1511, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1511),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((40), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");	
			}/* else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 63 to fletch this item.");
			}		
		}*/

						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1521 ) {//oak logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 15) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1521, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1521),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((60), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a level of 15 Firemaking to burn this log.");
			}	
			}
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1519 ) {//willow logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 30) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1519, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1519),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((90), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a level of 30 Firemaking to burn this log.");
			}
			}
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 6333 ) {//teak logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 35) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(6333, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6333),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((105), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a level of 35 Firemaking to burn this log.");
			}				
		
		}
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1517 ) {//maple logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 45) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1517, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1517),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((135), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a level of 45 Firemaking to burn this log.");
			}				
		
		}	
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 6332 ) {//mahogany logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 50) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
						
			c.getItems().deleteItem(6332, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6332),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((157), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You need a level of 50 Firemaking to burn this log.");
			}				
		
		}
		
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1515 ) {//Yew logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 60) {
						c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2732, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1515, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1515),1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((202), 11);
			c.getPA().walkTo(-1,0);
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.getX() + 1, c.getY());
			c.sendMessage("You light the fire.");
			} else {

			}				
		
		}
						if (itemUsed == 590 || useWith == 1513 ) {//magic logs
						if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFiremaking] >= 75) {
